ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // “Just take a deep breath, hold it in.
Then breathe into her.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // “What are you doing?
Hurry up! Breath deeply and
give her mouth to mouth!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:21}); // “What are you doing?
Hurry up! Breath deeply and
give her mouth to mouth!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:22}); // Push {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} once
to start the CPR gauge.
Push it again to stop the gauge.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // “This is bad…
You don't think she's dead,
do you?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“But…
she's just a girl…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Cloud}
“Guess I gotta do it…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // “Hurry up and do it!”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Tifa}
“{Cloud}, what are
you going to do?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Red XIII}
“You know I can't.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:15}); // “What? You don't know how?
Come over here, I'll show you.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // “Hey hey!
Priscilla, are you alright?”

dialogStrings:
“This is bad…
You don't think she's dead,
do you?”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}, what are
you going to do?”

“What? You don't know how?
Come over here, I'll show you.”

“Just take a deep breath, hold it in.
Then breathe into her.”

“What are you doing?
Hurry up! Breath deeply and
give her mouth to mouth!”

Push {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE} once
to start the CPR gauge.
Push it again to stop the gauge.
